bio: Aggregator of aggregators, offering gasless & regular swaps via open source API
impactDescription:
As part of joint mission of advancing public goods and sustainability future within Ethereum (and Optimism), MetaDEXA built products that improve and promote the Ethereum ecosystem and fully open-sourced every aspect of the products. 
Our commitment to streamlining DApp development, igniting creativity and innovation via open-source initiatives, and nurturing decentralized communities, all while cultivating a thriving developer network, actively contributes to Ethereum's long-term sustainability and the Collective's mission to foster a dynamic and prosperous ecosystem with a meaningful impact.
 
Milestones so far:
- Between $100.000 - $500.000 volume (estimated, contracts are not on Dune yet)
- 833 regular swaps in 3 months period 
- 25 gasless swaps (still under development)
contributionDescription:
Having aligned vision and values with Optimism community and as web3, decentralization, growth & innovation maxis, MetaDEXA has made the following contributions:
    Aggregator of Aggregators: Developed an open-source server API that aggregates quotes from integrated sources, simplifying access to the best quotes.

    Swapping Features: Created "gasless swaps" and a traditional "regular swap" function, enhancing user experience.

    MetaDEXA UI: Designed a user-friendly interface for MetaDEXA, promoting ease of use.

    Customizable DEX: Enabled users to create their own trading applications, pooling liquidity from every pool across Optimism

    Open source: anyone can contribute, improve, integrate and deploy their own trading application.

contributionLinks.description: MetaDEXA Server Repository: Swap and Gasless Swap Features
MetaDEXA Smart Contracts: Router, Gasless Swap, Swap Contracts
